section.name: Roadmap
section.p:
Now that this repackaging / splitting of the previous workbench into different flavours has been done, I can get back to fixing bugs (the striked out ones have been fixed as part of the repackaging). Once these bugs and bottlenecks are sorted out, I'll take a look at adding some new features.
NB: This roadmap doesn't include developments to the workbench GUI - this has it's own development plan, and progresses independenly.
